content:
Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 12, "index": 14}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 29, "index": 30}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 5, "index": 34}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 53, "index": 35}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 14, "index": 44}, {"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 50, "index": 45}]

thought: The first step in making end_stone_brick_slab is to make end_stone_bricks. To make end_stone_bricks I need to place end_stone in the center of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the end_stone from slot 26 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
